typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		MovieTitle as string,
		Category as string,
		Rating as string,
		RunTimeMin as short,
		ReleaseDate as date 'MM-dd-yyyy'
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovies
source(output(
		MovieActorID as string,
		MovieID as string,
		ActorID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeMovieActors
source(output(
		MovieID as string,
		OnlineMovieID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeOnlineMovieMappings
source(output(
		ActorID as string,
		ActorName as string,
		Gender as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> FourthCoffeeActors
FourthCoffeeMovies, FourthCoffeeOnlineMovieMappings join(FourthCoffeeMovies@MovieID == FourthCoffeeOnlineMovieMappings@MovieID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1, FourthCoffeeMovieActors join(FourthCoffeeMovies@MovieID == FourthCoffeeMovieActors@MovieID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Join2, FourthCoffeeActors join(FourthCoffeeMovieActors@ActorID == FourthCoffeeActors@ActorID,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join3
Join3 derive(SourceSystemID = 2,
		GlobalMovieID = concat('2', FourthCoffeeMovies@MovieID)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		MovieId = FourthCoffeeMovies@MovieID,
		OnlineMovieId = OnlineMovieID,
		Actorid = MovieActorID,
		ActorName,
		Gender,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 derive(GlobalMovieID = lower(GlobalMovieID),
		MovieId = lower(MovieId),
		OnlineMovieId = lower(OnlineMovieId),
		ActorId = lower(Actorid)) ~> DerivedColumn2
DerivedColumn2 select(mapColumn(
		SourceSystemID,
		GlobalMovieID,
		MovieId,
		OnlineMovieId,
		ActorId = DerivedColumn2@ActorId,
		ActorName,
		Gender,
		MovieTitle,
		Category,
		Rating,
		RunTimeMin,
		ReleaseDate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select2
Select2 sink(partitionFileNames:['CleanFourthCoffee.parquet'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
